name: In The Nick of Tie-m
description:
Join Nick in his getaway chase and escape the scene of the crime by stealthily making your way through the city back to his hideout. Traverse rooftops, sneak past searchlights, hurtle through windows into apartments, and climb up fire escapes in order to escape. Avoid making too much noise or standing in the light for too long because the police will detect you!

Features:

  • Vast cityscape to explore
  • Engaging stealth-focused platforming
  • Diverse obstacles and hazards
  • The guy has a tie
